BBEX3.A.UGX.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Uganda * / USD 1 = UGX ... (selling)

General: * In addition to the published exchange rates, according to IMF reports, from 14 June to 26 November 1989 and from 2 July 1990 to 31 October 1993, other exchange rates existed; however, we do not have any details of these exchange rates or explanations as to their use.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
